lead_paragraph: BERLIN, April 2 (UP) -- Amid angry warnings to Yugoslavia to remember the fate of Poland, authorized German quarters indicated tonight that the crisis in relations had reached such a grave impasse that political contact with the Belgrade government had ceased.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
